name: Home Owner Insurance
salesHighlights: We have preapproved suppliers who offer 24-hour services.
The amount you insure increases automatically to ensure your cover keeps up with rising building costs.
Personal-liability cover is included at no extra cost to you.
Cover for geysers and pipes is also included.
salesHighlightsDetails: I want affordable cover for when things go wrong, and I need to rebuild or repair my home.
salesHighlightsDetailsOption: Is homeowner's insurance from Nedbank right for me?
